original_text: One of them, called Cleopas, answered him, ‘Many things have happened in Jerusalem in the last few days. Are you the only visitor here that does not know about it?’
korean_text: 그 한 사람인 글로바라 하는 자가 대답하여 이르되 당신이 예루살렘에 체류하면서도 요즘 거기서 된 일을 혼자만 알지 못하느냐

sentences.original_text: One of them, called Cleopas, answered him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 사람인 클레오파가 그에게 대답했다

sentences.original_text: Many things have happened in Jerusalem
Are you the only visitor here
that does not know about it
